test_parsing.py¶

This module is to test all the parsing modules and methods that PoioAPI parser uses. Including the parser to the three data hierarchies, GRAID, MORPHSYN and WORD.

Note: This module it’ll test the modules that generates a XML file.

class test_parsing.TestCreateCommentFile[source]¶

This class contain the test methods to the class comment.py.

Methods

test_create_cmts_xml()[source]¶

Raise an assertion if can’t retrieve the file.

Return given file(s) as a single string.

Raises :

AssertionError :

If can’t retrieve a string.
